author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled test from platform details

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-59] Introduce a ${karaf.data} system property to be able to easily move the data directory to a different location.

author: rhuijben
msg: As a tiny step towards making the unified diff apply/patch code reusable
outside a working copy, move the eol and keyword property detection to
the target resolver, where the other wc specific checks are.
This would allow making resolve_target_path into a callback of a less
svn working copy specific api for unified diff application.
[ stsp notes: Making svn patch work for non-working copies is not
patch_target_info_t): Name structs to help debugger and diff -x -p.
